items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit.
items.body: Great fit. Perfect to wear to a December wedding. Read more
items.author: Connie Schmidt

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits well
items.body: Just tried on, it’s soft seams to be thick enough it looks nice on not sure about the belt. I will be wearing it to a wedding in December. So can’t give any details on washing. Read more
items.author: robin hammock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Lovely dress and flattering fit Read more
items.author: Kristina Shealey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for: CHEAP product
items.body: The design itself is so cute, and suited my silhouette alright, but I was so disappointed in the quality of the fabric. You definitely get what you pay for here, and that’s cheap product quality. If you’re going for stretch or comfort, then it’s reasonable. The belt it comes with is not for anyone with a round stomach and will be too short compared to the product images. The fabric is stretchy with a slight pull on all curves. The fabric feels thin and shows everything god gave you. Returned it because it felt like it would fall apart after a few washes. I’m always looking for Aritzia and other brand dupes, and this was absolutely not it. Read more
items.author: Sierra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Might want to size down.
items.body: Great fabric. Does not come with the belt pictured. I sized up from the recommended large to an XL. The XL was way to big and will try a large (I usually wear a size 12T or 14T) but even a medium might work. Color was as represented. Read more
items.author: Almase

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars the black dress you need
items.body: Perfect to dress up or down. It's very comfortable! Read more
items.author: Cambria Employment Project

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Grande
items.body: Me quedo muy grande Read more
items.author: Maria Segui

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pink dress
items.body: Warm light pink dress that falls mid calf. The dress is very stretchy but thick cotton . Doesn't itch, and smooth against skin. The dress is looser at the bottom and has sleeves that open at the wrist in a flare like manner. Very comfortable and work appropriate for my business casual job. It does come with a brown thin belt for the waist , but does not have hoops on the side of the dress, so the belt is very optional. ( id opt out because I felt a larger and perhaps pink belt would have looked better). Overall versatility with where this can be worn. Read more
items.author: sig

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Wine, Brown, Navy, Pink, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
